Clumpy API¶

This is the full API documentation of the clumpy toolbox.

Base objects¶

Base objects

State and palette¶

State blabla.

State(label, value, color)

Define a land use state.

Palette([states])

Define a palette, i.e. a set of states.

Layers¶

LandUseLayer([label, time, path, data, …])

Define a Land Use Cover (LUC) layer.

MaskLayer([label, time, path, data, copy_geo])

Mask layer.

FeatureLayer([label, time, path, data, …])

Define a feature layer.

Levels¶

Land(features, transition_probability_estimator)

Land object which refers to a given initial state.

Region(label[, verbose, verbose_heading_level])

Define a region.

Territory([regions, verbose, …])

Territory.

Transition matrix¶

TransitionMatrix(M[, palette_u, palette_v])

Define a transition matrix.

compute_transition_matrix(V_u, palette_u, …)

Compute the transition matrix from final states vectors.

load_transition_matrix(path, palette)

Load transition matrixes according to a given palette.

Estimation¶

Density Estimation¶

Density Estimation Methods

density_estimation.GKDE([h, …])

Gaussian Kernel Density Estimator.

Transition Probability Estimation¶

Transition probability estimation methods

transition_probability_estimation.Bayes([…])

Bayes transition probability estimator.

Allocation¶

Patches¶

allocation.BootstrapPatch([…])

Bootstrap patch parameters object.

allocation.compute_bootstrap_patches(state, …)

Compute bootstrap patches

Allocators¶

Allocators blabla.

allocation.Unbiased([update_P_v__u_Y, …])

Unbiased method.

Tools¶

Tools blabla

start_log(filename)

Start transcript, appending print output to given filename.

stop_log()

Stop transcript and return print functionality to normal
